sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PDF_G304Y ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , DIR_CARD_SEIL_NUM , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , FTYR_TOT_AMT , FTYR_MARKET_TOT_AMT , FTYR_TMONEY_TOT_AMT , PRE_TOT_AMT , PRE_MARKET_TOT_AMT , PRE_TMONEY_TOT_AMT , DAT_CD , BUSNID , TRADE_NM , USE_PLACE_CD , FIRST_TOT_AMT , SECOND_TOT_AMT , FIRST_YEAR_TOT_AMT , SECOND_YEAR_TOT_AMT , INQR_STRT_MM , INQR_END_MM , DIR_CARD_AMT_SUM , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , (SELECT COUNT(*)+1 FROM PDF_G304Y) , #formCd# , #resid# , #name# , #ftyrTotAmt# , #ftyrMarketTotAmt# , #ftyrTmoneyTotAmt# , #preTotAmt# , #preMarketTotAmt# , #preTmoneyTotAmt# , #datCd# , #busnid# , #tradeNm# , #usePlaceCd# , #firstTotAmt# , #secondTotAmt# , #firstYearTotAmt# , #secondYearTotAmt# , #inqrStrtMm# , #inqrEndMm# , #dirCardAmtSum# , #pdfDatAppYn# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PDF_G304Y SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , DIR_CARD_SEIL_NUM=#dirCardSeilNum# , FORM_CD=#formCd# , RESID=#resid# , NAME=#name# , FTYR_TOT_AMT=#ftyrTotAmt# , FTYR_MARKET_TOT_AMT=#ftyrMarketTotAmt# , FTYR_TMONEY_TOT_AMT=#ftyrTmoneyTotAmt# , PRE_TOT_AMT=#preTotAmt# , PRE_MARKET_TOT_AMT=#preMarketTotAmt# , PRE_TMONEY_TOT_AMT=#preTmoneyTotAmt# , DAT_CD=#datCd# , BUSNID=#busnid# , TRADE_NM=#tradeNm# , USE_PLACE_CD=#usePlaceCd# , FIRST_TOT_AMT=#firstTotAmt# , SECOND_TOT_AMT=#secondTotAmt# , FIRST_YEAR_TOT_AMT=#firstYearTotAmt# , SECOND_YEAR_TOT_AMT=#secondYearTotAmt# , INQR_STRT_MM=#inqrStrtMm# , INQR_END_MM=#inqrEndMm# , DIR_CARD_AMT_SUM=#dirCardAmtSum# , PDF_DAT_APP_YN=#pdfDatAppYn# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND DIR_CARD_SEIL_NUM=#dirCardSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PDF_G304Y WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , DIR_CARD_SEIL_NUM , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , FTYR_TOT_AMT , FTYR_MARKET_TOT_AMT , FTYR_TMONEY_TOT_AMT , PRE_TOT_AMT , PRE_MARKET_TOT_AMT , PRE_TMONEY_TOT_AMT , DAT_CD , BUSNID , TRADE_NM , USE_PLACE_CD , FIRST_TOT_AMT , SECOND_TOT_AMT , FIRST_YEAR_TOT_AMT , SECOND_YEAR_TOT_AMT , INQR_STRT_MM , INQR_END_MM , DIR_CARD_AMT_SUM , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_G304Y WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND DIR_CARD_SEIL_NUM=#dirCardSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , DIR_CARD_SEIL_NUM , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , FTYR_TOT_AMT , FTYR_MARKET_TOT_AMT , FTYR_TMONEY_TOT_AMT , PRE_TOT_AMT , PRE_MARKET_TOT_AMT , PRE_TMONEY_TOT_AMT , DAT_CD , BUSNID , TRADE_NM , USE_PLACE_CD , FIRST_TOT_AMT , SECOND_TOT_AMT , FIRST_YEAR_TOT_AMT , SECOND_YEAR_TOT_AMT , INQR_STRT_MM , INQR_END_MM , DIR_CARD_AMT_SUM , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_G304Y WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PDF_G304Y WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
